thread.title: Sabre celebrates a decade of continued success and industry innovation in the Middle EastTravelandtourworld.com

title: Sabre celebrates a decade of continued success and industry innovation in the Middle EastTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Sabre celebrates a decade of continued success and industry innovation in the Middle East Published on : Friday, August 21, 2015
Sabre Corporation a leading global technology provider to the travel and tourism industry, and Gulf Air, the Kingdom of Bahrain’s national carrier, have marked the 10 year anniversary of their longstanding joint venture partnership of Sabre Travel Network Middle East .
“Our anniversary with Gulf Air, one of our major airline partners in the region, is a tremendous milestone that reaffirms our commitment to the industry and our valued customers,” said Daniel Naoumovitch, CEO, STNME. “Over the past decade, we’ve made significant investments in innovative products and solutions that empower the travel industry to grow and better serve travelers. Our expansion across the region is built on having a strong customer-first culture and a genuine passion for helping our customers grow, innovate and succeed.”
Highlights over the past 10 years include:
Regional expansion from its home in Bahrain to the entire MENA region – increasing its investment to serve the needs of the growing industry. STNME now operates 23 offices in 13 countries throughout MENA in addition to 15 training centers across the region.
Strategic agreements with the top agencies across the region to help grow their business, compete globally and reach wider audiences through innovative solutions. Top agency customers include ITL Travel, Kanoo, Dadabhai Travel, Alshamel, Fursan and DNATA. In addition, Sabre expanded its relationship with leading airlines in the region including Oman Air, Etihad, Royal Jordanian, Egypt Air MEA and many others.
Launch of Sabre Red App Centre, the first B2B app market place that enables developers to contribute to the ongoing innovation in the travel industry. Since its global launch in 2012, Sabre Red App Centre has exceeded 1.2 million downloads by travel agencies worldwide.
Launch of TripCase, a leading itinerary management app that provides travelers with the right information at the right time. Earlier this year, Sabre launched TripCase on Apple Watch, making travel even easier as travelers receive itinerary updates and messages on their wrist.
Launch of new technology services including web, mobile and ancillary solutions, as well as exclusive products that help agencies create more revenue, reduce their costs, and be more efficient and productive in shopping, booking and managing travel.
“Gulf Air’s partnership with Sabre and the success of our joint venture, STNME, have seen us work together to deliver solutions that make travel even more convenient to passengers. Our continued growth and innovation over the past 10 years is the truest reflection of the strength of this collaboration between a pioneering national carrier and a global travel technology innovator.
Built on a strong customer focus, this has been our driving force over the first 10 years and will lead us in the future. We are delighted with our joint successes to date and we are anticipating many more in the future.” Said Dr. Jassim Haji, Gulf Air Director of Information Technology.
Source:-Sabre
